mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Roger Brooke Taney to George Peter, 1817 January 21
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Taney, Roger Brooke, 1777-1864
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter sent from Annapolis regarding the trial and acquittal of Judge H?, voting 43 for removing him and 24 against. Mentions four Federalist who voted against removal - Blake of Calvert, Joseph Taney of Frederick, Watts & Watkins. Issues with parties and state's judicial system. Questions the role of Mr. Washington and connection with Mr. Hanson. Autograph letter, 3 pages, separate sheet with address panel, postmarked 'Annap, Md. Jan 22.'
